website_summaries.verdict: This officially licensed remote motion controller offers plenty of visual design options and accurate control, and has Motion Plus built in.
pros: Available with Nintendo-themed artwork, like Bowser or Toad, and in various colors
Works with both Wii and Wii U systems
cons: Pricey, as it’s a licensed product
Users will need to buy additional nunchuk controller for many games

customer_reviews.title: This was just gross. DO NOT BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a brand new product, and it wasn't! Not only did they send me a used one. It was dirty and the battery panels were rusted and it doesn't even work. This was supposed to be a sure purchase because it was from "Nintendo". What a piece of garbage. I'm really really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Milagros Sanchez Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Great remote but break too easily
customer_reviews.text: Should be made of stronger materials to take impacts with floors, walls, tv's and other solid objects at high speed.
customer_reviews.author: Kienan

customer_reviews.title: Unbreakable Quality
customer_reviews.text: It's an official Nintendo controller that works with the Wii and Wii U. Has built-in MotionPlus functionality and is practically indestructible to boot. Will last for years of heavy use, unlike knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Can a controller be called "gorgeous?"
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! I recently bought Wii Fit U since it was cheap and there are several dancing games that require the motion plus. Since I haven't bought a wiimote since initially buying my Wii in 2007, I figured I would just purchase full wiimotes. I decided not to go cheap on an off brand because you never know what you'll get. I bought two and out of the package, these are shiny and beautiful! They come in nice matching black rubber grip cases (or condoms as I call them) and have black wrist straps. Synched up like champs and worked perfectly. Highly recommend! Not a bad price, either!
customer_reviews.author: Hollz

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo brand remotes are the BEST.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 remotes for our family. We are exclusively a Wii family; no other gaming systems. We have a Wii and a Wii U. Both worked perfectly out of the box; synced easily to our system, and have been problem free. These remotes have "Wii motion plus" built in, which is nice; no need to find the plug for the bottom. We bought 'knock offs' from a big box store because they lit up & looked cool - returned them 2 days later. Insist on nothing more than Nintendo remotes. These work well, and we have had no problems with them.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Guzzino

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace an old remote for an old original wii. It synced with no issues and worked perfectly. It did come with the silicone protector and mine did come with the "MotionPlus" stamped on it. I don't know if it makes a difference or not, but it is not more shaky than the old remote as other reviewers seemed to have found. I think it makes a difference who you purchase from.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: cute controller
customer_reviews.text: Cute controller, works great, came on time and packaged well, came with batteries and silicone protective case which i wasnt sure if that would come with it or not but no back up cord, ill buy another one with character to add to sons collection
customer_reviews.author: cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product sold by Click4Fun. Do not purchase from them!
customer_reviews.text: Motion controls only worked with the remote pointed diagonally upwards. Markings on the remote did not match official controllers. Rumble felt more aggressive than official controllers. Packaging looked cheap with letters running off the edge. I had a bad feeling before I even opened the box. And who packages zinc carbon batteries with any product these days? Do not purchase this product from Click4Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: controllers don't work
customer_reviews.text: Finally put batteries in the Wii controllers i brought for my daughters for Xmas. only to find out they don't work. i brought 3 and all 3 doesn't work. What a waste of money. I tried everything i could think of to get them to work but nothing. My daughters are so disappointed because we only have one black controller that works. I brought them because they were cheaper than the black ones. i should have paid the extra money, now i have to buy new ones. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Wii controllers
customer_reviews.text: We have an old Wii console, and one of our original controllers finally stopped working. I ordered this be and the Yoshi controller and they work great! There were no directions, but after finding the synch button on the back, we were good to go. They even come with batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: So much fun. The extra remote isn't necessary to have fun ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I didn't get a Wii sooner! So much fun. The extra remote isn't necessary to have fun with the Wii, but it eliminates the need to pass one remote between two players. We often have another couple over for games. Each couple can share a remote for individual or team play. Having extra remotes encourages people to use the wrist straps, which is important in games like bowling.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, except you can't use these and the old non-motion plus remotes at the same time.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but be aware that you can't use your old non-plus wii-motes after this one is connected to the system. I didn't realize that we wouldn't be able to use this one *and* the old ones on the games that don't require the motion plus when we bought it. If you buy multiples of these and throw the old wii-motes away, I suppose this is a non-issue, however, if you were hoping to still be able to use the others, you're out of luck.
customer_reviews.author: SewRusty

customer_reviews.title: Item recieved did not match description
customer_reviews.text: Remote I recieved did not have motion plus INSIDE as stated in the description. Beware when buying from 3rd party sellers!
customer_reviews.author: K. Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Works great! But our princess is in another castle...
customer_reviews.text: I tried buying one of the cheap off-brands remotes and it didn't work reliably. This official remote works great every time. I like the feel of the buttons, they're a slight improvement over the original Wii remotes. It's also nice to have the motion plus built-in with a nice small profile. The sync button is more easily accessible than the original remotes too, being outside the battery compartment. That location makes it easy to switch the remote from being used on the Wii to the Wii-U.
customer_reviews.author: Davewise

customer_reviews.title: This looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a Wii U and some of the games require you to have a Wii Remote for multi-player. I love Yoshi and the color scheme on this controller is awesome. It looks just like the pictures and makes for a unique Wii Remote. This is an authentic Wii Remote and comes in the original sealed official Nintendo packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these to replace my original Wii remotes and I couldn't be happier, these are the best quality remotes I've ever ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an authentic Nintendo product if you were wondering, I purchased these to replace my original Wii remotes and I couldn't be happier, these are the best quality remotes I've ever seen, and I love the colors! All the designs really pop and it's nice to be able to tell your remotes apart from one another. These include a set of batteries and a gel sleeve that matches the theme of the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Leyva

customer_reviews.title: More accurate than regular wii controllers
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was slightly cheaper but I saved a couple bucks on Amazon. The plus controllers are WAY better than regular wii controllers. They are much more accurate. You will feel the controllers movement, it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Kalvin Pettengill

customer_reviews.title: I know buying used is always a tricky deal. ...
customer_reviews.text: I know buying used is always a tricky deal...but this controller that I purchased is intermittent and ALWAYS disconnects from the game console during the middle of a game. I suppose since they don't make the controllers anymore and finding a decently priced one is literally hit or miss...I wish I would have had a heads up that this particular one has a few glitches and adjusted the price accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: The Original TOAD !
customer_reviews.text: Item is just as described by seller. This is an original item and already has the motion plus built in. NO need to purchase any adapters, EXCEPT the nunchuck which you will have to purchase separately. Make sure you push the red SINK button behind remote as well as the RED sink button on the Wii console.
customer_reviews.author: JoFer

customer_reviews.title: Mixed bag between real and fake ones.
customer_reviews.text: I paid full price for a knock off. ;( When I got it, the box was opened, I should have returned it right then and there. I did look genuine.. I didn’t think it was fake. The number at the bottom says RVL-003 when it should say RVL-036.
customer_reviews.author: Jasalynja

customer_reviews.title: The Toad Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus inside is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Toad Wii remote with Wii MotionPlus inside. I bought this Toad Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus inside from the seller “Video Game and Electronics Supplier” for about $20 more, but with faster shipping and it was a more reputable seller. Overall, the box for the Toad Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus inside had a couple scratches, but appeared to be unopened and the Toad Wii Remote with Wii MotionPlus inside itself was brand new and came with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Oldie but goodie.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know that some Wii games require special remotes with Motion Plus. When I got my Wii Sports Resort, I quickly found out it wouldn't play using my original Wii remotes. Instead of buying addons to the remotes which increased their size and weight, not ideal for small children, I got these with Motion Plus built in. Worked great out of the box and now we can't stop playing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lai

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: There are a LOT of WII controllers on the market, and you definitely get what you pay for (excuse the dangling participle). We play a lot of WII games and so spending the extra bucks for a new and genuine item is well worth it. Item is working fine so far and we love the character themed controllers.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Neblett

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged item
customer_reviews.text: Got my nice new remote today and was happy until i opened it and it was covered in battery acid from batteries i didnt know were included ( not in product description) Thanks for nothing i guess....
customer_reviews.author: Uraniumangel235

customer_reviews.title: Bowser & Toad Wii Remote+
customer_reviews.text: The remotes were high quality design and operated at full function. I prefer to use rechargeable batteries with an extra kick to them. I would recommend SunLabz rechargeable batteries if they are still in stock. I highly recommend this product for Wii remotes.
customer_reviews.author: John Claudio

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work properly
customer_reviews.text: Two stars because it works better than having nothing. The pointer shakes all over the place and it's a struggle to keep it as still as possible to click on whatever I need. Can't play my dancing games at all though. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ¢¾

customer_reviews.title: Works, but pricey!
customer_reviews.text: This is the new 'updated' Remote for the Wii/WiiU. We bought one to have enough Remotes for playing Mario Kart 8 as a family, but really there is no noticeable difference, except the price. I know the sensor is now directly inside, but we haven't seen any difference to make this really worth the price. It does work, though, so that is what we wanted and have. Just note you can use the old Remotes maybe as an option til these are not so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: larissa

customer_reviews.title: Missing protective cover
customer_reviews.text: Product offering clearly shows the protective cover but it was not included. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Triumph Sprint Rider

customer_reviews.title: Still useful in 2020
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works great. I love blue bottom shell, just too bad it's covered by the wiimote cover. Bought this (Toad) for the wii u as I still use both my wii and wii u and switch between them with one Zelda wiimote plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mashuu

customer_reviews.title: The remotes work amazing. Always buy the brand
customer_reviews.text: The remotes work amazing. Always buy the brand, and not the cheap versions. My whole family plays a lot of the multiplayer games. The remotes recharge well....as long as they are put away to charge. They will not charge with the wii shut down. So you need to have the extra backs, with the batteries, set aside in case the family wants to play next day. I would purchase this item again in the future. Rechargeable is always better than having to constantly replace batteries...which wii remotes will go through frequently.
customer_reviews.author: AlexSchief

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the real deal
customer_reviews.text: These are great controllers. There's nothing like the OEM Wiimote! These have the WiiMotion Plus built in, so you don't need the add-on extension wit them. The smaller form factor works well with some of the Wii Sport Resort games.
customer_reviews.author: 302cobraguy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I had an itch to play some older games but misplaces most of my old console remotes. Bought this one, and it works perfectly with the Wii and Wii U. It controls and feels just fine and allows me access to hours of nostalgic gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the Peach Plus Wii Remote
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the Peach Plus Wii Remote, the colors are great and the motion controls work really well. The only problem I had was the cost, but it didn't stop me from buying it in the end. If you are willing to pay high dollar for the design, then go ahead and buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Original better than cheap aftermarket
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace a cheap aftermarket controller that would not sync to the Wii. We bought a set of cheap aftermarket controllers and will not do that again. This original Wii controller is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PBar

customer_reviews.title: Great for the mario fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old who is amazing at Mario on the Wii and absolutely loves all things Mario and Luigi. Im keeping this 5 star cause it is a great controller and my son loved it but I bought the Luigi one as well and I didn't check amazon and when I received the Mario one and not the Luigi I was confused then I got on here and it showed it never sent due to not being in stock and they had refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Price

customer_reviews.title: ... is a Yoshi fan so I thought he would love getting this in his Easter basket
customer_reviews.text: My son is a Yoshi fan so I thought he would love getting this in his Easter basket. He was pretty excited for it. The only problem I have with it is that you have to reconnect it every time you want to use it. Then original remotes that came with the Wii connect automatically. Besides that I have used it multiple times and It is a good solid remote.
customer_reviews.author: Casey A Literski

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Product works great, arrived new as described. I like the rubber sleeve it came with (even though I have to take it off to use the unit with the wii u steering wheel).
customer_reviews.author: Sadie4184

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and looks great, just what you would expect from Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking Wii Remote. It works perfectly, just like any other Wii Remote Plus. My wife has been bugging me to get her a pink Wii remote of her own, and she loves princess peach, so when I saw they released this, I had to get it for her. She was so thrilled about it. She uses it every time we play Wii or Wii U. No issues from it whatsoever. I just wish Nintendo didn't sell these for such a high price.
customer_reviews.author: Bipo

customer_reviews.title: I love pink and I love Peach
customer_reviews.text: I love pink and I love Peach, so I just had to get this controller for me. I already had a pink Wii remote, so I did not feel like buying this was warranted. Then, the pink one stopped working and I was secretly happy it was broken and I had an excuse to get this one. Just as every other Nintendo product, it works perfectly and I have been very happy with it. I even bought the matching battle pad.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this
customer_reviews.text: Did not come in box , no Wii motion plus and came scratched
customer_reviews.author: Avery wyckoff

customer_reviews.title: works well with classic Wii, and at a good price
customer_reviews.text: These were a lot cheaper than the standard non-descript controllers I found online, and work just as well. They arrived in good condition (2 of them) and we have used them quite a bit and they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kalish

customer_reviews.title: Good controller. Works well. Fun colors.
customer_reviews.text: If you need controllers for your Wii, this series is great. Definitely shell out a couple extra shekels for the "name brand" to ensure compatibility and quality. I really like all of the colors and presentation in this series.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rossignol

customer_reviews.title: Defective, couldn't return!
customer_reviews.text: The controller didn't work properly out of the box. It can't seem to properly calibrate or just isn't sending a strong enough signal to be picked up by the infrared bar. Anytime we play a game it either shuts off or says the wii mote is disconnected from the Wii U. Tried to contact seller to send back but no avail. Not using this seller again. INCREDIBLY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J B

customer_reviews.title: Green Luigi, Red Mario, Pink & Blue Wii U (or Wii) Plus Controllers
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 4 remotes as listed in the title. Each one had the new method to sink to the Wii U. Only had to push the button on the remotes (which is no longer under the battery cover) to sink the controllers. No more holding button on controller and on the Wii U console to sync. Batteries were included with each controller we received. No issues with any of them. The newer controllers that are easier to sync have the letters "USZ" printed on top on the box in the upper right hand corner. Will leave an "update" if we should have any issues with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: J E

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the quality of this product. My original remotes that were purchased with my WII console are still working after 8 years. Very disappointing that this product did not last much longer. The remote does not respond at all with new batteries. There are no lights.
customer_reviews.author: Hatch Batch

customer_reviews.title: Really great Wii mote
customer_reviews.text: Really great Wii mote. I would recommend it if you have one that needs to be replaced. I have a very old Wii and it works perfectly with that. I purchased the white one and it came with a very nice clear squishy shell to put the mote in. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a gift. It works great, and I'm glad I purchased the actual Nintendo brand after reading reviews about the lag time of remotes made by other companies. The recipient likes that it has the motion sensor built in and really loves the color blue.
customer_reviews.author: cowink4

customer_reviews.title: I love Toad for the price I got these for.
customer_reviews.text: Do I wish these looked cooler like Bowser, Mario, etc... Yes but for the price I was really happy to get brand New controllers with toad for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Stupid People are Annoying

customer_reviews.title: Not clean
customer_reviews.text: Was not clean at all. Very disgusting stuff behind the battery lid. For the price it should have at least come clean. Giving it 3 stars instead of two because at least it still works as if today's date.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It works! And it arrived on time.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why it was so difficult, but I finally got a Wii remote that actually works. Came on time and worked immediately and properly. I had 2 others from other sellers that didn't work and appeared used even though they were sold as new. If you want a quality product that delivers what it promises, this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Charles Mohr

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the remote shown.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time but was not a Mario remote. It was just a red Nintendo Wii remote. Disappointed that it does not say ‘Mario’ or have the ‘M’ on it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé and I have a Wii that we love. Yes its dated but we still have a blast with it. My niece and nephew have come to share our love for the console and its exciting party games so we had to get extra controllers when they come around. They both fought over this cool bowser controller and it did not disappoint. Worked perfectly with the console and it looks awesome.
customer_reviews.author: codered1126

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily, solid, sleek, and functional
customer_reviews.text: Black is the new...black? Well either way this black Wii-mote (w/ built in motion plus) is exactly what I needed to rock the Wii U on Super Mario Bros. There is zero lag as is evident when running and last second jumping over lava pits. Additionally, it is solid and no buttons stick. However, I will say the plastic controllers quickly become "greasy" from your hands (note: don't eat popcorn while playing), so a case is recommended. Additionally, the sync button for this controller is on the back of it, so no need to open up battery pack to get to it.
customer_reviews.author: Afton and Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The black Wii was slightly cheaper than the white Wii so I bought the black one (I believe it looks better, too). I didn't want mismatching accessories, and these fit the bill. Just as you expect. Works great. Held up to a few blows from my daughter against the coffee table, and it's still working like it did when we bought it. They come with the neoprene covers, and that was fantastic - glad I didn't have to shell out more for those! The only downside is the neoprene covers don't make it easy to access the power button on the top left corner... very, very minor detail, but that's all I could find wrong with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: We needed a replacement for our misplaced Wii remotes in order to work our Wii to watch Netflix. After a few tough minutes figuring out how to link the remote to the machine, we had it working like a charm! I like the black so much more than the white, looks sleeker and stays cleaner. This came with the add-on extra bottom piece, so it was complete and ready to use right out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Tried an off-brand at first, but it was glitchy so I was happy to find the real-deal for a good price. I guess the price is reduced because of the Toad character decor...but we don't mind a bit. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!!!
customer_reviews.text: I believe I purchased this from a other seller. Not Nintendo. I believe, I could be wrong. Anyway it came 100% brand new with a clear case, a wrist strap, and of course the remote. The comments from the sellers had read it was used, I do believe like new but it looks and works brand new for me.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4Est2009

customer_reviews.title: Happy kiddo
customer_reviews.text: This cute "Yoshi remote" as my kids say, is perfect for my little wii u player. I bought this one for my 4 year old and I paid less than I would have for the basic white remote. This was listed as "like new" "in box" and that's exactly what I recieved. There were absolutely no visible signs of wear on the remote and it functions perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Marie

customer_reviews.title: European Packaging
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell this is an authentic remote. It does have some differences (the white A button being the most noticeable) from the version I have already, which I am assuming are mainly due to being manufactured at different times. I was surprised to receive a European remote and the instructions were missing, but overall the remote feels and works like it should with my Wii and I am happy to have found a new remote rather than buying used.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Overall, most of it works but not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: All of buttons work besides the right button the D-pad when you hold the remote vertically. I have been able find a way around the issue in the games I play, but I expected a completely working remote.
customer_reviews.author: Isabell C.

customer_reviews.title: Original Nintendo Controller
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement to aging Wii controllers for motion plus games like Red Steel 2. We have several go to games still in our house for Wii and will be buying more controllers as time wears on.
customer_reviews.author: chillausmc

customer_reviews.title: Brand New Official Wii Motion Plus
customer_reviews.text: It was a brand new official Nintendo Wii Remote with motionplus inside. It is white with red buttons and a Toad icon. Works like a charm. Although batteries were included, their expiration date was 7/2020 (Not Nintendo’s fault as the device was made in 2015). Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Santino Morrone

customer_reviews.title: The perfect controller for Super Mario and Nintendo fans
customer_reviews.text: This is a Wii / Wii U Remote Plus, it works perfectly and its made of quality materials. This particular Mario Edition is absolutely outstanding, it has the same color scheme as the mustache italian plumber, Nintendo has paid attention to detail on this creation. I hope that they release a Yoshi and Peach editions like this. Also, it would be great to have an Official Nintendo Nunchuck that matches the color of this controller.
customer_reviews.author: antovasa

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. The "remote plus" allows you extra fun ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to go with the Wii Mini. Great purchase. The "remote plus" allows you extra fun features like sensory feedback for certain events (a small vibration) and you can shake it to fly or for big jumps. Really a lot of fun. My kids (4 and 6) have really enjoyed playing the Wii and the remotes just add to the experience. I recommend going for the "plus." Just makes it even more fun.
customer_reviews.author: MommaCX3 ☀️❤️

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this controller because our previous Wiimotes had disappeared. Unfortunately in order to play tLoZSS you need this controller. The adapter doesn't work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Norcross II

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: Looks a lot better in person than it does in the pictures. Very nice and solid controller for your wii or wii u. Got it cause it was the cheapest one out of all of them, dunno why these are getting expensive in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I like that the motion plus accessory is now built into ...
customer_reviews.text: Official Nintendo Controller, high quality. I like that the motion plus accessory is now built into the controller, now there is less stuff to keep track of and the controller feels less bulky then previous controllers that required the expansion device to be plugged in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: I like this Wii Remote Plus (Toad) way more than the original white wii remote. It works great and looks nice, and when I bought it, it was the cheapest brand new wii remote plus that I can find!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Knockoff remote
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back the Wii Remote because it was a knock off. The product worked, but the molding was off and the buttons were poor in quality. Ended up buying a used Mario remote from Gamestop for less.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE - Not as promised
customer_reviews.text: NOT AS PROMISED. Did NOT come in box, did NOT come with wristband, one did NOT even come with the rubber cover!!! WILL be returning ... BUYER BEWARE! Scam site.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: This is what USED, LIKE NEW,COLLECTIBLE looks like!!
customer_reviews.text: WISH I COULD GIVE LESS THAN ONE STAR!! CONTROLLER ARRIVED THIS EVENING --- NOT ONLY IS IT NOT THE WII REMOTE PLUS, BIT I OPENED UP THE BATTERY COMPARTMENT TO FIND CORRIDED BATTERIES AND A CORRODED BATTERY COMPARTMENT!! 😡😡😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Necole Fryar

customer_reviews.title: ready to play
customer_reviews.text: We wanted an additional remote so we could have the grandkids compete. This was ready for action as soon as we synched it to our wii.
customer_reviews.author: sdfriend

customer_reviews.title: Offical ones better then the knockoffs!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I tried to save some money when I got my Wii U and picked up 2 knockoff remotes from Ebay, I could easily tell they were junk after using them for a minute, parts were rattling, they weren't accurate and their was a delay on screen using them. Ended up buying 2 official ones and I could immediately tell the difference. Better build quality, no lag or jumping around on the screen. Also as these we a replacement for my older controllers that had the Motion Plus separate, it is nice it is now built into the smaller controller.
customer_reviews.author: AHelpfulVoice

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Works both for Wii and WiiU. Easy to sync and play. Power down controls after each play to conserve battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome replacement Wii remote!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Wii remote as a replacement for one that no longer wanted to work. Arrived timely (early!) and we immediately put it to use. It comes with 2 AA batteries. It has worked perfectly and better than the original.
customer_reviews.author: ATL2DC

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 and one if them has a broken clamp on the strap. Not a big deal for me, especially for the great price I paid. They work perfectly and pair with our WiiU with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Smarah

customer_reviews.title: As Expected
customer_reviews.text: I always thought these remotes were on the pricier side. The pricing here is better than I found in stores, but I still don't know why a tiny remote like this costs so much. I digress, this product is well made and durable though.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: He likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew to be his special remote for our house since he likes Mario Kart Wii. He uses only this remote now. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M Summers

customer_reviews.title: Only buy from Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wii remote for our WiiU, only buy from Nintendo and these work great. Nothing really special about it, just a normal remote that works great. Has the controller gel covering and arm strap. Works with WiiU, no idea if it works on regular Wii but I'd imagine it does.
customer_reviews.author: Myke

customer_reviews.title: Works great with original Wii
customer_reviews.text: We have an original Wii and needed to replace controllers. These have motion plus built in.
customer_reviews.author: RD2D

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother who is in an assisted living facility and they wii bowl weekly. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My man and I bonded over Wii golf and bowling years ago, but lately his original remote hasn't been working. We kept thinking that our batteries just weren't good, but I suddenly realized that it must be the remote itself that went bad. I ordered this one, it came very quickly, we tried it right away and it works perfectly!! No more wasting batteries or waiting forever for the darn thing to find a connection! We will definitely be buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bowser!
customer_reviews.text: Cool unique Wii remote plus. Of course it's quality and works perfectly. Comes as pictured with silicone protector and wristband which are very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I'm building a collection of these remotes for Mario Kart racing. Now I have my favorite character on the screen and my controller.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. It's a Nintendo product, and as a result, it is high quality, durable. So, I am very satisfied. Even the batteries lasted a long time before we had to get more! It's a little pricey since it's a Wii Motion Plus controller, but it is worth it since it can play any Wii Games.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to third-party sellers with crazy names
customer_reviews.text: So far it works well. They remote was not packaged in a box, it did not include the strap, and it did not include the silicone cover as indicated in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: FALSE Description!!
customer_reviews.text: Item was used and opened when received. I checked the item very closely, and noticed signs of usage and scratches. I am very disappointed since this was a gift to my child. I WILL NOT conduct business with this seller again!! It’s a shame since I’ve seen other items I wished on purchasing. DO NOT BUY unless if you don’t care whether items are used.
customer_reviews.author: MOISES ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Works well - no pic of Mario
customer_reviews.text: This works as well as any wii remote. It includes wii motion plus. I was pleasantly surprised that it included the rubber protector for the remote as well as two AA batteries! The only disappointment was that it does not have a picture of Mario on the remote. There is the "M" symbol, and my son loves the red color, but I thought it would have a picture of Mario. If I needed any more remotes, I would definitely purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy4mykids

customer_reviews.title: Great Controller.
customer_reviews.text: The WiiRemote is one of the best controller ever! Its great for solo play, and its even better for party games (Just Dance, Wii Sports, Nintendo Land...) its very responsive and easy to hold! I wish it comes with rechargeable batteries but I have many AA Rechargeable Batteries in the house so is not a big issue for me... Order only from AMAZON, you can get fakes with some 3rd party sellers here...
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Used items dirty
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, but I thought I was buying new from Armageddon Potato Games. However, the remotes were dirty and scratched, and the wrist straps were stiff with dirt. Disappointed in the shape they in. At least clean them before you sell them.
customer_reviews.author: Letisha Epperson

customer_reviews.title: Brand new And  to go right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Came in original packaging with rubber remote cover and batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Sister05

customer_reviews.title: No Good
customer_reviews.text: It just won't pair/register with the console. I had to get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne In Detroit

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: great remote! we got this to replace some old WII remotes that were not working great; we love it! It works great and lets our kids show of their personal style. We have several and they all look great! connected to our WII U with no problem
customer_reviews.author: momof4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it’s a genuine Wii remote! In good condition as well!
customer_reviews.author: Adam591

customer_reviews.title: Non-Operable and Corroded
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Wii controller as a Christmas gift. I wrapped it and was excited to give it to my son. When he opened it and went to put the batteries in, he found the leads corroded and the controller would not work with fresh batteries. So disappointed! Then I had to pay to ship it back. I'm out shipping and a gift. Awful product and service!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G. Disch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great! Don’t waist your money on a generic brand ..this one is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: carla catnip

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Nintendo product
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why this didn't come with my Wii U but in any case, it's the real deal and works great with the Nunchuk controller I bought separately. I thought about buying knock offs because they are way cheaper but too many reviews said don't bother wasting your money. I'm glad I didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and I so when he is here we can use them. They work perfectly, are comfortable, and will last.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bates

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the real deal, not a knock-off
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from USA Books and Movies, received on time, product is new in box. Examined closely, and I feel confident this is the real deal. Note: Mark G's video review is very helpful for know all the little things to look for in real vs counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: so I am glad I was able to find this at a reasonable ...
customer_reviews.text: I always select the "TOAD" character when racing against my 12 year old daughter and now that I have a specific TOAD controller, I can see a significant improvement in the speed and control of my Mario Cart racing. :) For whatever reason, finding a WII+ remote either new or used is becoming extremely difficult, so I am glad I was able to find this at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nintendo Wii Remote Plus, Bowser
product_meta.description: Color:BowserSimple. Intuitive. Easy to use. The Wii Remote Plus is a unique controller for the Wii and Wii U video game systems.
feature_bullets: Now with the increased sensitivity of Wii MotionPlus built-in. The button pressing of typical controllers is replaced by the natural, fluid motion of your hand.
The Wii Remote Plus senses your every action and makes you feel less like a player and more like you're part of the game. With Wii, anyone can play.
Some games may require additional accessories (sold separately). See game instruction manuals.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars3,587 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
